Bachelors degree or equivalent work experience 
5+ years of leadership experience in materials testing or metallurgical lab environment 
Experienced with material characterization test methods and sample prep including machining, mechanical testing, metallography and heat treat 
Solid understanding of industry standards (e.g. ASTM, ISO) and quality systems, with a focus on maintaining data integrity and lab compliance 
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to lead diverse technical teams and collaborate cross-functionally 
Hands-on problem solving ability and a continuous improvement mindset, experience implementing process enhancements and mentoring technical skills

Experience operating with Instron and MTS mechanical test equipment
